post:
KNOWNHOST® - AWARD WINNING VPS PROMO – NEW UPGRADES & PLANS, KVM and OpenVZ, FREE MIGRATION

[KnownHost, LLC](https://www.knownhost.com/ "KnownHost, LLC") is a privately held firm that has been providing premium managed services since 2006.

To **KNOWNHOST**, you are always valuable! Here is how we prove it to you every day:

* **100% SSD BACKED**. All services are backed by SSD Arrays and SSD Storage Clusters!
* **FREE MIGRATIONS**. Currently use cPanel or DirectAdmin? Let our staff migrate your data for free on all managed hosting tiers.
* **SCALABLE CONFIGURATIONS**. Need more resources? Upgrade your server with no downtime to a higher tier. Downgrades too!
* **DISASTER RECOVERY BACKUPS INCLUDED**. We include disaster recovery backup images for all VPS products. This doesn't mean you shouldn't keep your own backups as well but KnownHost has you covered.
* **PROVEN UPTIME**. 99.999% uptime record that is top of the industry! Why? Because you want hosting, not excuses.
* **ALWAYS ONLINE SUPPORT**. 24/7/365 customer support. You contact us. We answer. Simple, right? We've got you covered from initial setup to support 24 hours a day
* **30 DAYS MONEY BACK**. Anyone can behave for a few days. Once the NEW customer label clicks off your account, most hosting companies struggle to remember your account number. Try us out for 30 days, poke into all the features, and test our customer service. You don’t love KNOWNHOST -> you get your money back.


LowEndTalk Exclusive Special!: At KNOWNHOST, our goal is to keep you as a customer for LIFE. Yep…forever and ever! We don't want you to hesitate to give us a try, that's why we're offering an exclusive LET only discount.
We are offering a limited time discount of **80% Off your first month** of the base hosting package on monthly billing terms! We also offer additional discounts for quarterly, semi-annual or annual billing that you keep forever. Save up to 15% when you choose Annual billing!

There are two ways to sign up for the Exclusive Promotion:

1. Click the link next to the package of your choice and you will be whisked away to use your promo code to start your account.
2. Test drive our customer service. When we say, we are here for you, we are not EVEN messing around. Call us at 1-866-332-9894 or go to https://www.knownhost.com to click QUICK CONTACT in the upper right corner. We are ready to sign you up!

_LET80 Discount coupon is valid for the first month of monthly billing only. After the first month customers are able to swap to quarterly, semi-annual or annual billing to obtain term discounts. Coupon applies to the base unmanaged server price only and does not discount any software licenses, add-on's or management services. Coupon valid until Jan 31st 2021._
